code: public static boolean isShardNotAvailableException(final Throwable e) {     final Throwable actual = ExceptionsHelper.unwrapCause(e).     return (actual instanceof ShardNotFoundException || actual instanceof IndexNotFoundException || actual instanceof IllegalIndexShardStateException || actual instanceof NoShardAvailableActionException || actual instanceof UnavailableShardsException || actual instanceof AlreadyClosedException). }

comment: /**  * If a failure is already present, should this failure override it or not for read operations.  */
code: /**  * If a failure is already present, should this failure override it or not for read operations.  */ public static boolean isReadOverrideException(Exception e) {     return !isShardNotAvailableException(e). }
